resources.string:
==Orbital characteristics== **Distance from sun:** 149.6 million km (1 AU)
 **Eccentricity:** 0.0167
 **Orbital period:** 365.256363004 days
 **Average orbital speed:** 29.78 km/s
 **Inclination ecliptic:** 0° (by definition)
 **Satellites:** 1 (the Moon)
==Physical characteristics== **Equatorial radius:** 6,378.1 km
 **Flattening:** 0.0033528
 **Volume:** 1.08321×10^^12^^ km³
 **Mass:** 5.9736×10^^24^^ kg
 **Mean density:** 5.515 g/cm³
 **Equatorial surface gravity:** 9.780327 m/s² (0.99732 g)
 **Escape velocity:** 11.186 km/s
 **Sidereal rotation period:** 23h 56m 4.1s
 **Equatorial rotation velocity:** 1,674.4 km/h
 **Axial tilt:** 23°26'21"
 **Bond albedo:** 0.306
 **Surface temperature:** -89.2°C to 57.8°C
==Atmosphere== **Surface pressure:** 101.325 kPa (MSL)
 **Composition:**
 78.08% nitrogen (N,,2,,)
 20.95% oxygen (O,,2,,)
 0.93% argon
 0.038% carbon dioxide
 About 1% water vapor (varies with climate)


Find out more on [[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Earth|wikipedia]].
